summary: Star⭐CDN 是信网推出的免费 CDN 加速服务，支持 Jsdelivr、Gravatar 等主流公共库的镜像加速。依托全球多节点部署架构，有效提升网站加载速度，全面兼容 HTTPS 及 HTTP/3.0 协议，拥有高可用性、安全防护与实时同步核心优势。用户仅需替换链接即可轻松使用，无任何隐藏收费，项目开源且配备详细使用指南与常见问题解答。
thumb: data:image/webp;base64,

[Star⭐CDN](https://scdn.xn--kiv.fun/)

            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;

            width: 100%;
            height: 100%;
            background: url('data:image/svg+xml;base64,');
        }

            font-size: 2rem;

            position: relative;

            box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);

    <!-- Usage Instructions -->
    <section id="usage" class="container my-5">
        <h2 class="section-title text-center">使用指南</h2>
        <p class="text-center text-muted mb-5">简单几步即可接入我们的CDN服务，提升您的网站加载速度</p>

        <div class="usage-instructions bg-light rounded-xl p-5 shadow-lg mb-5">
            <h3><i class="fas fa-code"></i> 如何使用 Star⭐CDN</h3>

            <div class="usage-steps">
                <div class="usage-step bg-white rounded-xl p-4 mb-4">
                    <div class="step-header d-flex align-items-center">
                        <div class="step-number bg-primary text-white rounded-circle d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center me-3">
                            <span>1</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="step-title fw-bold text-primary">确定资源链接</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="step-content mt-3">
                        <p class="text-muted mb-3">找到您需要加速的资源当前使用的链接，例如：</p>
                        <div class="code-example bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                            <code>//cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@3.6.0/dist/jquery.min.js</code>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="usage-step bg-white rounded-xl p-4 mb-4">
                    <div class="step-header d-flex align-items-center">
                        <div class="step-number bg-primary text-white rounded-circle d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center me-3">
                            <span>2</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="step-title fw-bold text-primary">替换为 Star⭐CDN 链接</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="step-content mt-3">
                        <p class="text-muted mb-3">将原始链接中的域名替换为我们的加速域名：</p>
                        <div class="code-example bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                            <code>//scdn.星.fun/npm/jquery@3.6.0/dist/jquery.min.js</code>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="usage-step bg-white rounded-xl p-4 mb-4">
                    <div class="step-header d-flex align-items-center">
                        <div class="step-number bg-primary text-white rounded-circle d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center me-3">
                            <span>3</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="step-title fw-bold text-primary">更新网站代码</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="step-content mt-3">
                        <p class="text-muted mb-3">在您的网站代码中，将原始链接替换为新的 Star⭐CDN 链接：</p>
                        <div class="code-example bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                            <code>&lt;script src="//scdn.星.fun/npm/jquery@3.6.0/dist/jquery.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;</code>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="usage-step bg-white rounded-xl p-4">
                    <div class="step-header d-flex align-items-center">
                        <div class="step-number bg-primary text-white rounded-circle d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center me-3">
                            <span>4</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="step-title fw-bold text-primary">验证加速效果</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="step-content mt-3">
                        <p class="text-muted mb-3">保存更改后，在浏览器中访问您的网站，检查资源是否通过 Star⭐CDN 加速加载：</p>
                        <div class="code-example bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                            <code>打开浏览器开发者工具（F12） → Network → 查看资源加载来源</code>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-lg-4 mb-4">
                <div class="feature-card h-100 shadow-sm">
                    <div class="card-header bg-primary text-white rounded-top">
                        <i class="fas fa-code me-2"></i> Jsdelivr.net 使用方法
                    </div>
                    <div class="card-body p-4">
                        <div class="code-block bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                            源地址：//cdn.jsdelivr.net
                        </div>
                        <div class="code-block bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                            替换为：//scdn.星.fun
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="card-footer text-end bg-light p-3 rounded-bottom">
                        <a href="https://www.jsdelivr.com/" class="text-muted small" target="_blank" rel="external noopener nofollow">@ Jsdelivr.net</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="col-lg-4 mb-4">
                <div class="feature-card h-100 shadow-sm">

                        </div>
                        <div class="code-block bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                                替换为：//scdn.星.fun/avatar
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="card-footer text-end bg-light p-3 rounded-bottom">
                        <a href="https://www.gravatar.com/" class="text-muted small" target="_blank" rel="external noopener nofollow">@ Gravatar</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="col-lg-4 mb-4">
                <div class="feature-card h-100 shadow-sm">
                    <div class="card-header bg-primary text-white rounded-top">
                        <i class="fab fa-google me-2"></i> cdnjs资源库使用方法
                    </div>
                    <div class="card-body p-4">
                        <div class="code-block bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                                源地址：//cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax
                        </div>
                        <div class="code-block bg-gray-50 rounded p-3">
                                替换为：//scdn.星.fun/ajax
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="card-footer text-end bg-light p-3 rounded-bottom">
                        <a href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/" class="text-muted small" target="_blank" rel="external noopener nofollow">@ Cloudflare.com</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- FAQ Section -->
    <section id="faq" class="faq-section">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="section-title text-center">常见问题</h2>
            <p class="text-center text-muted mb-5">以下是用户最常遇到的问题解答</p>

            <div class="accordion" id="faqAccordion">
                <div class="accordion-item">
                    <h3 class="accordion-header" id="headingOne">
                        <button class="accordion-button" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseOne">
                            Star⭐CDN 是免费的吗？
                        </button>
                    </h3>
                    <div id="collapseOne" class="accordion-collapse collapse show" aria-labelledby="headingOne" data-bs-parent="#faqAccordion">
                        <div class="accordion-body">
                            是的，Star⭐CDN 的基础加速服务是永久免费的。我们承诺不会对基础CDN服务收取任何费用，也没有任何隐藏收费。我们的收入主要来自企业级增值服务和合作伙伴支持，这使我们能够维持免费服务的运营。
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="accordion-item">
                    <h3 class="accordion-header" id="headingTwo">
                        <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseTwo">
                            如何确保资源的及时更新？
                        </button>
                    </h3>
                    <div id="collapseTwo" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingTwo" data-bs-parent="#faqAccordion">
                        <div class="accordion-body">
                            我们采用智能同步机制，对于热门资源会实时监测上游变化并立即同步；对于其他资源，我们每小时检查一次更新。您也可以通过在我们的域名后添加 <code>?flush=1</code> 参数强制刷新缓存（例如：https://scdn.星.fun/npm/jquery@3.6.0/dist/jquery.min.js?flush=1）。
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="accordion-item">
                    <h3 class="accordion-header" id="headingThree">
                        <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseThree">
                            是否有使用限制？
                        </button>
                    </h3>
                    <div id="collapseThree" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingThree" data-bs-parent="#faqAccordion">
                        <div class="accordion-body">
                            为了保障所有用户的公平使用，我们对免费服务有以下合理限制：
                            <ul>
                                <li>单个域名每日请求量不超过50万次</li>
                                <li>单个文件大小不超过50MB</li>
                                <li>不支持非公开的私有资源</li>
                            </ul>
                            绝大多数个人网站和小型企业网站都不会触及这些限制。如有特殊需求，可以联系我们申请提高限额。
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="accordion-item">
                    <h3 class="accordion-header" id="headingFour">
                        <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseFour">
                            如何报告问题或提供建议？
                        </button>
                    </h3>
                    <div id="collapseFour" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingFour" data-bs-parent="#faqAccordion">
                        <div class="accordion-body">
                            我们非常重视用户的反馈。您可以通过以下方式联系我们：
                            <ul>
                                <li>电子邮件：<a href="mailto:fankui@xnet.ren">fankui@xnet.ren</a></li>
                                <li>GitHub Issues：<a href="https://github.com/scfcn/StarCDN/issues" target="_blank">提交Issue</a></li>
                                <li>QQ群聊：<a href="https://qm.qq.com/q/sugzhf6lQO" target="_blank">点击链接加入群聊</a></li>
                            </ul>
                            我们通常会在1-2个工作日内回复所有问题。
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="accordion-item">
                    <h3 class="accordion-header" id="headingFive">
                        <button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#collapseFive">
                            你们支持哪些协议？
                        </button>
                    </h3>
                    <div id="collapseFive" class="accordion-collapse collapse" aria-labelledby="headingFive" data-bs-parent="#faqAccordion">
                        <div class="accordion-body">
                            Star⭐CDN 全面支持现代Web协议：
                            <ul>
                                <li>HTTP/1.1 (兼容所有浏览器)</li>
                                <li>HTTP/2 (多路复用，提升加载效率)</li>
                                <li>HTTP/3 (基于QUIC协议，优化高延迟网络)</li>
                                <li>HTTPS (全站SSL加密，支持TLS 1.2/1.3)</li>
                            </ul>
                            系统会自动为每个用户选择最优的协议，无需特别配置。
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- About Section -->
    <section id="about" class="about-section">
        <div class="container">
            <h2 class="section-title text-center">关于 Star⭐CDN</h2>
            <div class="about-content">
                <img src="star/images/iocdn_about.png" class="about-img floating" alt="Star⭐CDN">
                <div class="about-text">
                    <p>Star⭐CDN 是由信网于2023年发起并维护的开源项目，旨在为开发者社区提供高质量的免费CDN加速服务。项目最初是为了解决国内访问国外公共库速度慢的问题，现已发展成为覆盖全球的CDN网络。</p>
                    <p>我们的技术团队由来自云计算、网络加速和安全领域的专家组成，拥有多年的大型分布式系统开发经验。Star⭐CDN 采用自主开发的智能路由系统和缓存优化算法，确保用户能够获得最佳的加速效果。</p>
                    <p>与传统的商业CDN不同，Star⭐CDN 坚持开源、透明、中立的运营理念。我们的所有基础架构代码都在GitHub上开源，欢迎开发者参与贡献。项目的发展由社区驱动，所有重大决策都会公开讨论。</p>
                    <p>目前，Star⭐CDN 每天为超过5000万次请求提供加速服务，涵盖从个人博客到大型企业的各种应用场景。我们的目标是成为开发者最信赖的公共资源加速平台。</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Feedback Section -->
    <section id="feedback" class="feedback-section">

                    <p>常见问题类型包括：</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>资源加载异常或内容不正确</li>
                        <li>访问速度突然变慢</li>
                        <li>证书错误或安全警告</li>
                        <li>任何疑似滥用或违规内容</li>
                    </ul>

    <!-- Scripts -->
    <script src="https://cdn.iocdn.cc/npm/bootstrap@5.0.2/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://npm.elemecdn.com/vanilla-lazyload@17.8.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
    <script>
        // Initialize tooltips
        var tooltipTriggerList = [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('[data-bs-toggle="tooltip"]'));
        var tooltipList = tooltipTriggerList.map(function (tooltipTriggerEl) {
            return new bootstrap.Tooltip(tooltipTriggerEl);
        });

        // Smooth scrolling for anchor links
        document.querySelectorAll('a.smooth').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const targetId = this.getAttribute('href');

                if (targetId === '#') return;

                const targetElement = document.querySelector(targetId);

                if (targetElement) {
                    const navHeight = document.querySelector('nav').offsetHeight;
                    const offset = targetElement.offsetTop - navHeight - 30;

                    window.scrollTo({
                        top: offset,
                        behavior: 'smooth'
                    });

                    // Update URL without jumping
                    if (history.pushState) {
                        history.pushState(null, null, targetId);
                    } else {
                        location.hash = targetId;
                    }
                }
            });
        });

        // Add active class to current section in navbar
        const sections = document.querySelectorAll('section');
        const navLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-list');

        window.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
            let current = '';

            sections.forEach(section => {
                const sectionTop = section.offsetTop;
                const sectionHeight = section.clientHeight;

                if (pageYOffset >= (sectionTop - 100)) {
                    current = section.getAttribute('id');
                }
            });

            navLinks.forEach(link => {
                link.classList.remove('active');
                if (link.getAttribute('href').includes(current)) {
                    link.classList.add('active');
                }
            });
        });

        // Theme toggle
        const themeToggle = document.getElementById('theme-toggle');
        const themeIcon = themeToggle.querySelector('i');

        themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
            document.body.classList.toggle('dark-theme');

            if (document.body.classList.contains('dark-theme')) {
                themeIcon.classList.remove('fa-moon');
                themeIcon.classList.add('fa-sun');
                localStorage.setItem('theme', 'dark');
            } else {
                themeIcon.classList.remove('fa-sun');
                themeIcon.classList.add('fa-moon');
                localStorage.setItem('theme', 'light');
            }
        });

        // Apply saved theme
        const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
        if (savedTheme === 'dark') {
            document.body.classList.add('dark-theme');
            themeIcon.classList.remove('fa-moon');
            themeIcon.classList.add('fa-sun');
        }

        // Animation on scroll
        const animateOnScroll = () => {
            const elements = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-item, .list-box, .about-img, .feedback-img, .speed-test-img');

            elements.forEach(element => {
                const elementPosition = element.getBoundingClientRect().top;
                const screenPosition = window.innerHeight / 1.2;

                if (elementPosition < screenPosition) {
                    element.style.opacity = '1';
                    element.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                }
            });
        };

        // Set initial state for animation
        document.querySelectorAll('.feature-item, .list-box, .about-img, .feedback-img, .speed-test-img').forEach(el => {
            el.style.opacity = '0';
            el.style.transform = 'translateY(20px)';
            el.style.transition = 'opacity 0.6s ease, transform 0.6s ease';
        });

        window.addEventListener('scroll', animateOnScroll);
        window.addEventListener('load', function() {
            animateOnScroll();
        });
    </script>

</body>
</html>
!!!
